data_table.description: Form 43 - Hormone Use Interview - current and past hormone replacement (duration, frequency); history of oral contraceptive, diethylstilbestrol, depo-provera use. This form was required for all OS participants.

variable.name: F43AGE
variable.comment: Computed from the date Form 43 was completed and the date of birth recorded on Form 2.

variable.name: RECENCY
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Time (years) from randomization/enrollment since quitting HRT use (unopposed estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patch).

variable.name: OC
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Indicator variable for ever use of oral contraceptives.

variable.name: OCAGEMIN
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at first use of oral contraceptives.

variable.name: OCAGEMAX
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at last use of oral contraceptives.

variable.name: OCTIME
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Total lifetime duration of use in years of oral contraceptives.

variable.name: OCBPREG
variable.description: OC use before first term pregnancy

variable.name: OCBPTIME
variable.description: OC use before first term preg duration (years)

variable.name: DMPAFREQ
variable.comment: Used in conjunction with DMPA frequency unit of measure (UOM)

variable.name: DMPAUOM
variable.comment: Used in conjunction with DMPA frequency of use

variable.name: TOTE
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Indicator for ever use of unopposed estrogen from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTECAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Categorial variable of total duration in years of unopposed estrogen use from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTEMIN
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at first use of unopposed estrogen from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTEMAX
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at last use of unopposed estrogen from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTESTAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Unopposed estrogen use status (never, past, current) from pills or patches. Current means at the time Form 43 was completed.

variable.name: TOTETIME
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Total duration in years of unopposed estrogen use from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Indicator for ever use of estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTPCAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Categorial variable of total duration in years estrogen plus progesterone use from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTPMIN
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at first use of estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTPMAX
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at last use of estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTPSTAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Total estrogen plus progesterone use status (never, past, current) from pills or patches. Current means at the time Form 43 was completed.

variable.name: TOTPTIME
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Total duration in years of estrogen plus progesterone use from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTH
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Indicator for ever use of unopposed estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTHCAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Categorial variable of total duration in years of unopposed estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone use from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTHMIN
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at first use of unopposed estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTHMAX
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Age at last use of estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patches.

variable.name: TOTHSTAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Total HRT (unopposed estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone) use status (never, past, current) from pills or patches. Current means at the time Form 43 was completed.

variable.name: TOTHTIME
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Total duration in years of HRT (unopposed estrogen and/or estrogen plus progesterone) use from pills or patches.

variable.name: PCYCLE
variable.description: Progesterone cycle during last PERT use
variable.comment: Computed from Form 43. Progesterone cycle from last use of estrogen plus progesterone from pills or patch.

variable.name: TEST
variable.description: Testosterone or other male hormone use

variable.name: TESTSTAT
variable.description: Testosterone or other male hormone status

variable.name: TESTTIME
variable.description: Testosterone or other male hormone duration (years)
